title: 求一套完整的RPG服务器纯净NPC教程，必有重谢
author: DamageE
txt_content:
就是那些纯净服务器里的任务NPC和怪物怎么造......
求大神指点......

replies.author: Humble——
replies.txt_content: 你需要一个叫RPGiteme的插件，还有个MythicMobs的插件
Citizens 和 MythicMobs 最后还有 Betonquest

replies.author: Moxuer
replies.txt_content:
任务NPC
插件：Shopkeepers 
链接：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... &highlight=shop[有教程]

怪物
插件：Mythicmobs
链接：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... mp;highlight=Mythic
